basicDisplay() - Method in class UserInteraction
This is the first window to appear when the user starts the game.

bet - Variable in class TypeTest
 
Bet - Class in <Unnamed>
Bet is a class that extends the Type class, it adds a new variable named betPoints and is used to change the points correctly for this type of game.
Bet() - Constructor for class Bet
 
bet1000 - Variable in class UserInteraction
 
bet250 - Variable in class UserInteraction
 
bet500 - Variable in class UserInteraction
 
bet750 - Variable in class UserInteraction
 
betPoints() - Method in class UserInteraction
If the type for the round is Bet, then before asking the question and after announcing the category, this method requests the player to make a bet, choosing between 250, 500, 750 and 1000 points.
betPoints2() - Method in class UserInteraction
In case there are two players, this method is used to accept the second player's bet.
